thread.title: Bonefish Grill features Hooked on Halloween menu on Tuesdays
thread.title_full: Bonefish Grill features Hooked on Halloween menu on Tuesdays | Examiner.com

author: Maria Adcock
title: Bonefish Grill features Hooked on Halloween menu on Tuesdays
text:
Courtesy of Bonefish Grill, used with permission Bonefish Grill is offering a Hooked on Halloween three-course menu for those looking to enjoy a delicious dinner and a fun night out for the whole family. The special menu is offered on Tuesdays for dinner and features three generous courses starting at only $14.90.
Start with a choice of the Bonefish House Salad or Classic Caesar Salad. Next choose one of nine entrée options including Atlantic Salmon, Spicy Tuna Bowl, Angler’s Sirloin Steak, Ahi Tuna Steak, Cold Water Lobster Tail, Fontina Pork Chop, Sea Scallops & Shrimp, Pecan Parmesan Crusted Rainbow Trout, and Filet Mignon.
Entrees offer a choice of sauce such as Lime Tomato Garlic, Mango Salsa, Herb Pesto, Pan Asian Sauce, and Lemon Butter. Fresh sides include Garlic Whipped Potatoes, Potatoes Au Gratin, Steamed Broccoli, Jasmine Rice, and French Green Beans.
Finish the meal with a choice of signature dessert including Jen’s Jamaican Coconut Pie (creamy coconut custard, Myers Rum sauce, fresh whipped cream), Classic Cheesecake (with sea salt caramel, chocolate sauce, powdered sugar), or Macadamia Nut Brownie (flourless brownie, raspberry sauce, vanilla ice cream, macadamia nuts).
Take advantage of the Hooked on Halloween menu at Bonefish Grill for a scrumptious dinner. Find a local Bonefish Grill on the restaurant’s website. Bon Appétit!
